amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for Transportation Security Administration Transportation Security Officers or Behavior Detection Officers outside an airport.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for Transportation Security Administration Transportation Security Officers or Behavior Detection Officers outside an airport.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 210 (Roll no. 365).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 210 (Roll no. 365).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
